Lynda.com - WordPress Ecommerce: Integrating Shopify with Morten Rand-Henrikson
1h 25m Beginner Uploaded in 21, 2014

Using Shopify, you don't need any technical expertise to sell your products or services online. And with Shopify's Widgets app, you can integrate a Shopify store into an existing WordPress site and make it an automatic ecommerce platform. Morten Rand-Hendriksen shows how to leverage the powers of the self-hosted versions of WordPress and Shopify in one clean and functional package. After reviewing the install process, Morten shows how to start adding products to your site with the three different Shopify widgets. He'll also show a workflow for importing existing Shopify products into WordPress, and create a custom template for displaying product details.
